articles.title: Kanye West is reportedly worth $6.6 billion - CNN
articles.description: Kanye West officially became a billionaire last year. Now, he's a billionaire six times over.

articles.author: TMZ Staff
articles.title: Cardi B, Megan's Grammy 'WAP' Draws 'Disgusting Strip Club' FCC Complaints - TMZ
articles.description: Cardi B and Megan Thee Stallion are being compared to the likes of Pepe Le Pew and Dr. Seuss after their Grammy night performance of "WAP" prompted dozens of heated -- and sometimes amusing -- complaints to the FCC.
